title: High noon (Captioned)
creator_credit: Fred Zimmerman, Stanley Kramer and United Artists Corporation
brief_description: A retired marshall is forced to take up his badge and guns again when a killer he has sent to jail returns to town seeking revenge. The townspeople refuse to help and his new bride wants him to run away from the fight. The marshall meets the killer and his three accomplices at high noon in one of the most suspenseful and thrilling gunfights ever filmed. Cast includes Gary Cooper and Grace Kelly. Based on the story ‘The Tin star’ by John W. Cunningham.
